text: I played Goggle Ramp in standard and killed so many people out of the blue with Fall last year.
Uyo does it at the cost of a land
Goggle ramp?
How do you ramp past the first?

You ramped to it, used goggles to double copy Tormenting Voice/Magmatic Insights until you hit Fall. Deck died hard to planeswalker builds but was pretty resilient to Eldrazi meta, and it was really fun and stupid and interactive. Pitching a Drownyard Temple to a doubled Insight then casting the Temple always felt great
About the only fun standard deck I've played in years
Lol, that sounds fun
<@U33EGB4TX> Reiterate can copy spells for as much mana as you can muster.
Yea Reiterate was the best one I could think of. Wasn't sure if there was a 1-shot spell instead of having the buybit back like Rite
